title: Chao Shen Xueyuan 3rd Season: Shen yu Shen

alternative_titles.ja: 超神学院 第三季 神与神

synopsis:
The main theme will be the full-scale invasion of Earth by the demonic group and the fierce counterattack by the angelic group and the warriors of the Earth's Super God Academy. Wars are raging in various places, with the navy, army, and air force all participating. Earth is about to enter an era of heroes, and the story will bring unprecedented shock.

(Source: Bangumi, translated)
